name: hail2u.net
description: The source files of Hail2u (https://hail2u.net/) website
author: Kyo Nagashima <hail2u@gmail.com> (https://kyonagashima.com/)

scripts.css: cp -ru src/css/. dist/css/ && node bin/css.js && node bin/style-guide.js
scripts.deploy: cd dist/ && git add --all && git diff --cached --exit-code --quiet || git commit --message="Build" && git push origin gh-pages
scripts.img: cp -ru src/img/. dist/img/ && cp -uT src/img/icon-small.svg dist/favicon.svg && node bin/img.js
scripts.static: cp -u src/.nojekyll src/CNAME src/robots.txt dist/ && cp -ru src/documents/. dist/documents/ && cp -ru src/pub/. dist/pub/
scripts.test: npm run test_css && npm run test_js
scripts.version: npm run css && npm run js && npm run img && npm run static && npm run html -- --articles && npm run html && npm run feed
scripts.postcontribute: npm run deploy && git switch - && git rebase master
scripts.postthing: npm run deploy && git switch - && git rebase master
scripts.postversion: git push origin master --tags && git switch - && git rebase master
scripts.predeploy: npm run html && npm run feed
scripts.prething: git switch master && npm run clear
scripts.preversion: git switch upnext && git rebase master && git switch master && git merge --ff-only upnext && npm ci && npm test
